<h2 align="left">Hello, I‚Äôm Temitayo Adebayo üëã</h2>

<h2 align="left">Frontend Developer | UI/UX Designer</h2>

---

Theezigner specializes in crafting accessible, responsive, and visually engaging user experiences that not only look great but work flawlessly across devices. My work blends modern frontend technologies with UI/UX best practices to create products that are both elegant and functional. 

- üéØ Focused on developing polished, responsive websites with modern frontend technologies.

- üé® Strong in design thinking and crafting intuitive interfaces that put the user first.

- üîú Planning to expand into backend development to become a more versatile full-stack developer.

- üìö Currently a student at AltSchool Africa ‚Äì [School of Engineering](https://engineering.altschoolafrica.com/)

- ü§ù Open to collaboration, learning opportunities, and exciting frontend projects that challenge creativity and problem-solving.

## üìå Featured Projects

### üîπ [Spots App](https://github.com/Theezigner/spots-app.git)  
A modern code snippet organizer built with **React + Vite + Tailwind + DaisyUI**, featuring folders, search, and CRUD functionality.  
üöÄ [Live Demo](https://spots-app-ashen.vercel.app)

---

### üîπ [Exam Todo App](https://github.com/Theezigner/exam-todo-app.git)  
A **React + TanStack Query** powered Todo app with **offline sync** using Dexie.js.  
üöÄ [Live Demo](https://exam-todo-app-xi.vercel.app)

---

### üîπ [interactive Credit Card Design](https://github.com/Theezigner/interactive-card-design.git)  
An interactive credit card preview form with **TypeScript + Tailwind**, updating in real-time as the user types.  
üöÄ [Live Demo](https://interactive-card-design-plum.vercel.app)

---

üí° **See all my projects:** [GitHub Repositories ‚Üí](https://github.com/Theezigner?tab=repositories)
